title: Submissive After Dark: Menage Stories Bundle
description: This erotic story bundle from author Cara Cane includes five hot menage stories with one theme in common: submission. The stories are explicit from start to finish. They are designed to arouse and allow the reader to explore sexuality through the written word. The bundle includes four unrelated short stories as well as the bestselling six-part novelette, Menage Maid Service. Story list: Glory Hall: FMMMMM Soapland: FFF The Victorian Cure: MFM Corporate Punishment: FMFM Menage Maid Service: FMF Content warning: This story bundle is all sex and no nonsense. It contains explicit language and material from start to finish. For readers 18+ only! Themes explored in this novelette: BDSM, (bondage, submission, domination), polyamory, bisexuality, and more.
author: Cara Cane
